message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can give me the better deal, I'm the one who's losing value with each round!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect too much!
I'm not giving up yet! You're not getting away with such a bad deal!
I'm starting to get serious, don't underestimate me!
I'm not backing down, I'm going to make the best of this situation!
I'm not going to give up, I'll make you an offer you can't refuse!
I'm not going to give up, I'll take the last chance to make a deal!
